mapper.select: INSERT INTO udi_device_record ( id, zxxsdycpbs, cpbsbmtxmc, zxxsdyzsydydsl, sydycpbs, cpbsfbrq, sfybtzjbs, btcpbsyzxxsdycpbssfyz, btcpbs, cpmctymc, spmc, ggxh, sfwblztlcp, cpms, cphhhbh, qxlb, yflbm, flbm, ylqxzcrbarmc, tyshxydm, ylqxzcrbarywmc, zczbhhzbapzbh, cplb, cgzmraqxgxx, sfbjwycxsy, zdcfsycs, sfwwjbz, syqsfxyjxmj, mjfs, qtxxdwzlj, ybbm, tsrq, scbssfbhph, scbssfbhxlh, scbssfbhscrq, scbssfbhsxrq, tscchcztj, tsccsm, versionNumber, versionTime, versionStauts ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{zxxsdycpbs}, #{cpbsbmtxmc}, #{zxxsdyzsydydsl}, #{sydycpbs}, #{cpbsfbrq}, #{sfybtzjbs}, #{btcpbsyzxxsdycpbssfyz}, #{btcpbs}, #{cpmctymc}, #{spmc}, #{ggxh}, #{sfwblztlcp}, #{cpms}, #{cphhhbh}, #{qxlb}, #{yflbm}, #{flbm}, #{ylqxzcrbarmc}, #{tyshxydm}, #{ylqxzcrbarywmc}, #{zczbhhzbapzbh}, #{cplb}, #{cgzmraqxgxx}, #{sfbjwycxsy}, #{zdcfsycs}, #{sfwwjbz}, #{syqsfxyjxmj}, #{mjfs}, #{qtxxdwzlj}, #{ybbm}, #{tsrq}, #{scbssfbhph}, #{scbssfbhxlh}, #{scbssfbhscrq}, #{scbssfbhsxrq}, #{tscchcztj}, #{tsccsm}, #{versionNumber}, #{versionTime}, #{versionStauts} )

SELECT id, zxxsdycpbs, cpbsbmtxmc, zxxsdyzsydydsl, sydycpbs, cpbsfbrq, sfybtzjbs, btcpbsyzxxsdycpbssfyz, btcpbs, cpmctymc, spmc, ggxh, sfwblztlcp, cpms, cphhhbh, qxlb, yflbm, flbm, ylqxzcrbarmc, tyshxydm, ylqxzcrbarywmc, zczbhhzbapzbh, cplb, cgzmraqxgxx, sfbjwycxsy, zdcfsycs, sfwwjbz, syqsfxyjxmj, mjfs, qtxxdwzlj, ybbm, tsrq, scbssfbhph, scbssfbhxlh, scbssfbhscrq, scbssfbhsxrq, tscchcztj, tsccsm, versionNumber, versionTime, versionStauts FROM udi_device_record WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY ylqxzcrbarmc, cpmctymc, ggxh
